lit. firewood, rice, oil and salt/fig. life's daily necessities

sentences.english: Chances are it contains phthalates and are out gassing chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 它非常可能含有鄰苯二甲酸鹽，且正在揮發化學物。

sentences.english: Dehydration and fever can be treated with oral rehydration salts and paracetamol.
sentences.chinese: 脫水和發燒可用口服補液鹽和對乙酰氨基酚進行治療。

sentences.english: But soup should not be wasted, for some salt had been put in it.
sentences.chinese: 然而湯是不應該糟蹋的，裏面放得有鹽呢。

sentences.english: The common driers are metal octoate and metal naphthenate.
sentences.chinese: 常用的是變價金屬環烷酸鹽和異辛酸鹽。

sentences.english: Snow is a mineral, just like diamonds and salt.
sentences.chinese: 雪是一種礦物，就像鑽石和鹽一樣。

sentences.english: Even when we reduce the salt to a fine powder , it will taste well.
sentences.chinese: 即使我們把鹽研磨成很小的粉末，他嚐起來還是鹹的。

sentences.english: Add tomato puree, salt and 1 cup water; bring to a boil.
sentences.chinese: 加入番茄醬，鹽與1杯水，煮至沸騰。

sentences.english: Do not use too much salt when using the dry salting method.
sentences.chinese: 用幹醃法醃魚時，不要用太多的鹽。

sentences.english: ' " Naturally, he bought a sack of salt from Uvinza.
sentences.chinese: 自然，他從烏溫扎買了一袋鹽。

sentences.english: with the year's coin for salt and taxes
sentences.chinese: 用於買鹽和交租的一年的收成。

sentences.english: By all appearances, this is a moment of reckoning for salt.
sentences.chinese: 各種跡象表明，這是對鹽進行清算的時刻。

sentences.english: ORS and zinc bring the risk of death down to almost zero.
sentences.chinese: 而口服補液鹽和補鋅可幾乎完全消除死亡危險。

sentences.english: ADD salt and tomato paste halfway through the cooking, or later.
sentences.chinese: 在烹飪過程加適量的鹽或番茄醬或者稍後加。

sentences.english: A survey in France has shown that women who tend to eat a lot of salt wrinkle more.
sentences.chinese: 法國的一項調查表明，女性喫鹽喫多了容易長皺紋。

sentences.english: You can also do another salt shot halfway through your run.
sentences.chinese: 跑步的半途中還可以再補一次鹽。

definition: thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam
to work extra hours/to do overtime
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
